name: Infinity Drought
description:
Infinity Drought

As climate change takes us into a new era, we will experience droughts and flooding like we've never witnessed before, bringing visions of both extremes: a desert wasteland and a world covered in water.

---- lyrics by Adam Eivy ---
Taking a train to infinity
Gazing out over the sea
Come along, you can ride for free
We can have eternity

And we sail away through the day
Dream of what the world will be
Endless sea

And we sail away
Far away...
----

lovely A# F C F C# F F# F synth riff from one of the best cartoon series of all time: Infinity Train, via the Grid Car theme.
